body_html:
So is there anything I can do to move this and the einsum (#6307) forward?
I think this here is likely more immediate (as it fixes a regression vs. 0.3.1) but the sumproduct_pair is more natural in the einsum context.
From my point of view, both patches are ready for review.

body:
So is there anything I can do to move this and the einsum (#6307) forward?
I think this here is likely more immediate (as it fixes a regression vs. 0.3.1) but the sumproduct_pair is more natural in the einsum context.
From my point of view, both patches are ready for review.
